revised_title: Ancient Trumpets and Antiquities Found in County Tyrone, Ireland
tldr: The author, Francis Nevill, describes the discovery of ancient trumpets and other artifacts in County Tyrone, Ireland. He speculates that these trumpets were used by pagan priests in funeral rites, as they were not found in any Irish stories or traditions related to martial affairs. The author also discusses a gold artifact of unknown purpose and a stone formation found with the trumpets.
